alert.note: Alert for Crow Wing; Koochiching; North Cass; North Itasca; Northern Aitkin; South Aitkin; South Cass; South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 10 at 2:52PM CST until February 11 at 4:00AM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches with locally higher amounts to 5 inches possible. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. A brief period of stronger winds is expected this evening. There will also be some freezing drizzle after the main area of snow moves off tonight. * WHERE...South Itasca, North Cass, Koochiching, North Itasca, South Cass, Crow Wing, Northern Aitkin and South Aitkin Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Mille Lacs Band, East Lake and, Big Sandy Lake areas and the Bois Forte Band, Deer Creek and, Nett Lake areas. * WHEN...Until 4 AM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Crow Wing; Koochiching; North Cass; North Itasca; Northern Aitkin; South Aitkin; South Cass; South Itasca
